alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Hall; Hamilton; Sherman; Valley; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 3:55AM CDT until March 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to start as rain that will transition to snow Thursday morning. Snow amounts will be on the lighter side, but strong winds will blow around anything that falls, reducing visibility. In addition, temperatures falling below freezing during the day may make surfaces very slick.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Hall; Hamilton; Sherman; Valley; York
